TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Unlikely.

Why do they wear ties?

Yep

So have we completely given up on coherent sentences in this modern world?

Yep, sentences like oh hey llok nw pg already is "coherent" 

Why does Kerbiloid have no profile picture for so long?

Because he is erroneously thinkning that people can read.

How many stars are there on the sky? I mean, on the flat sky background image?

As many as you can see.

If a turtle loses his shell, is he naked or homeless?

He's naked, it's his clothes!

If I eat Minmus, do I poop Jool?

Only on mundays.

 

Can I has BEESECHURGER?

Again, only on mundays.

When you open a bag of cottonballs, are you supposed to throw the first one away?

Once again, only on mundays.

Do I go slower than an ant to go interstellar?

Yes, because you need a wormhole.

What if the space wormhole is actually a snailshell?

Then you better be careful where you step in the garden.

If I build a structure in the sea that uses solar, wind, wave and tidal power to pump seawater through a reverse osmosis filter and then electrolise the pure water to create hydrogen and oxygen that are then pumped through separate pipe lines back to shore so they can be combusted together to run power stations and/or fuel hybrid vehicles and so eliminate the nitous oxide problem as well as the created water being used to top up water supplies. Where is the flaw in that idea?

A lot of filters is needed.

Is Everyday Astronaut aware of any punctuation marks but exclamation?

Yes, including ex-clam-ation

What if I deep-dived to Jool, would I end up back to Kerbin?

Been there done that. You go boom under the surface, I think it was around negative 500 metres but it has been awhile.

If Dres doesn't exist then how come I have been there?

You actually went to the Mun but without Kerbin in it. They've been tricking us all this time! 

If I adapt, everyone adapts?

Only if you believe that we are all figments of your imagination.

Can we all just go back to the nice stable 1.10.1 ?

No, but you can go to 1.13, and be more unstable. Now that's stupid

Can I have a badge

You can. Forge it.

Is @Kerbal Productions a badger?

Yes. No he is not.

If I switched Dres with the Mun, and did a mission, do you think anyone would call me out on that?

They would ask, why are you flying to nowhere, as everybody knows that there is no Dres.

What's the origin of the non-existing Dres joke truth?

All the lazy astronauts found it too hard to get too so pretended it doesn't exist.

Why astronaut not astronaught.

Because astronauts are secretly naughty and they don't want to receive coal for Christmas

Is the Sun the home of aliens?

Yes. Really hot ones.

Is the moon actually a spaceship that has a million years of dust built up on it?

Yes, it's abandoned now. We should clean up the Moon first with big brooms. And lots of them!

Is Kerbin bigger than what the rat looks like here?

No. The rat looks and likes it.

Is a thinner version of hamster a sausagster?
